page.title: 07Fresh fruit and vegetables
page.content: There are four houses along the road from Maplehurst to Copsale which sell {fresh fruit and vegetables}direct to the public. They advertise their produce on boards by the roadside. These are the produce for sale on the {19th July 1985}and the{prices}being charged: free range eggs 90p a doz. lettuces 15p each cucumbers 20p and 30p each cougettes 25p a lb spinach 25p a lb redcurrants 75p a lb goats milk 25p a pint Ivories Farm produces and sells free range eggs. They go to places like Harrods and Marks and Spencer at premium prices. Belmordean Farm is beginning to grow {organically}grown cereals for the health food market.
